The current source trunk is under active development, and may be unstable.  The latest stable release is 0.5.1 available from the [http://code.google.com/p/oauth-dot-net/downloads/list download section].

[http://code.google.com/p/oauth-dot-net/source/browse/ Continue to browse source...]

= New On The Trunk =

 * Additional work is being performed on OAUTH Discovery with XRDS-Simple parsing.  These libraries are experimental and may change between versions.

 * The dependency on the Windsor container is being removed and replaced with the Common Service Locator interface

 * Tests are being moved out of the core assemblies to reduce their dependencies
